column4: Hello... I just installed 8.04.1 and am getting static from my sound card. It is an Creative Sound Blaster Live! Wave card. This is an oldie but goodie. I know it works with OpenSuse 11 coz I tried it on my virtual machine. Please help! :(
Anyone have any ideas, why I am getting static from my Creative SoundBlaster Live! sound card?
maybe you need to get sound up a little> try alsamixergui
Then you should check ubuntuforums for a help or try to see what modules are loaded with lsmod etc
He is saying where you are listening the sound, on the card itself..
Then try to search ubuntuforums or google.. http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=114551
I already told you solution page for Live!: http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?t=114551
Try to search ubuntuforums/google, that is what i mostly do..
We are all preased it worked for you :)
you own us that you will help, too someone else, sometimes :)
Me too, I use ubuntuforums, mostly ;)
You can use ntfs-3g for that and list partition in /etc/fstab
all you need to do is install ntfs-3g, ntfs-config and ntfsprogs
